title: White Screen after champ select (MAC)
body: Login > Find Game > Champ Select, then the screen goes white and a message shows up saying something like "couldn't connect to server retry or cancel". Seen heaps of other people with this same issue please fix

replies.body:
Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.

I tried spamming space bar and enter, didn't work. Re-installed LoL, didn't work. Tried client repair, didn't work.

I've seen so much on the internet that works for others but not me. This might be an issue Riot will have to fix, only being a fix for some people.
tried both client repair and reinstalling client, both were unsuccessful
Submit a ticket. Tech isn't my area I can't help you any further.
